What are the treatments for surfactant dysfunction ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of surfactant dysfunction:  - Children's Interstitial and Diffuse Lung Disease (chILD) Foundation: Surfactant Deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Surfactant metabolism dysfunction, pulmonary, 1  - Genetic Testing Registry: Surfactant metabolism dysfunction, pulmonary, 2  - Gen
